```
services:
  nginx:
    container_name: nginx
    build: ./nginx/
    volumes:
      - shared-volume:/usr/src/app

  web-app:
    container_name: web-app
    env_file: .env
    volumes:
      - shared-volume:/usr/src/app/public
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production

volumes:
  shared-volume:
```

```
volumes:
  data:
    external: true
    name: shared-data
```
